    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initializer method: Populates the combo box.

      • popFields

        public void popFields​(Customer customer)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Populates all the fields with the data extracted from the selected row. This method is called inside the Main controller so the selected Customer can be used as an argument.
        Parameters:
        customer -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • onModCustModB

        public void onModCustModB​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Event for the "Modify Customer" Button: Checks for invalid inputs. If all inputs are valid a new Customer object is created and the old Customer is updated via the Customer DAO. The user is then returned to the Main view.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -

      • onModCustCancelB

        public void onModCustCancelB​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the user to the Main view upon clicking the "Cancel" button.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onMCountryComboBox

        public void onMCountryComboBox​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is activated once a new country is selected on the combo box. Clears the selected item in the First Division combo box if any are present. Populates the First Division combo box with locations belonging to the selected Country.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
